donor_type_mention.donor_type: Donor was not mentioned as living or deceased

donor_relationship_mention.donor_relationship: Donor relationship status was not mentioned

spans: Immunosuppression level is now within target level.
rx_therapeutic_status_mention.rx_therapeutic_status: Immunosuppression levels are documented as therapeutic, adequate, or within target range.

rx_compliance_mention.rx_compliance: Patient is documented as compliant with immunosuppressive medications.

spans: CMV viremia was detected by PCR (440 IU/mL)
viral_infection_mention.viral_infection: Viral infection confirmed by laboratory test or imaging, viral infection diagnosis was 'confirmed' or 'positive', or reduced immunosuppression due to viral infection

bacterial_infection_mention.bacterial_infection: Bacterial infection confirmed by laboratory test or imaging, bacterial infection diagnosis was 'confirmed' or 'positive', or reduced immunosuppression due to bacterial infection

graft_rejection_mention.graft_rejection: Treatment prescribed/administered for kidney rejection (AMR or TCMR)

ptld_mention.ptld: PTLD was 'diagnosed', 'confirmed' or 'positive' or viral positive lymphoma

cancer_mention.cancer: Cancer is presumed, suspected, likely, cannot be ruled out, or biopsy of any lesion
